bookTitle: The Blue Book of Stories (Boy Stories)
Plot: A mysterious book of short stories circles Mr L's fifth grade class, passed from student to student, hidden from Mr L's watchful gaze. What makes this book so gripping, readable, and entertaining? Probably something sinister. Mr L takes it upon himself to read these stories and find out... DISCLAIMER: These are stories for fifth grade boys, about fifth grade boys. If you have never been or known a fifth grade boy, please do not attempt to read this book.
